SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Graduation Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Graduation Rate is Research Investment Rate

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Graduation Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Graduation Rate is Discipline Coverage Rate.

SRP.Q: On the Research Investment Rate, is the point for Lake Adamchester University inside or outside the point for East Kimberlymouth Academy?
SRP.A: On the Research Investment Rate, the point for Lake Adamchester University is inside the point for East Kimberlymouth Academy.

VPR.A: label {Discipline Coverage Rate} encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of East Kimberlymouth Academy?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Discipline Coverage Rate}, while the weakest aspect is{ Graduation Rate}.

VPR.Q: On dimension Discipline Coverage Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Discipline Coverage Rate, label {Lake Adamchester University} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Graduation Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Graduation Rate, label {Lake Adamchester University} scores the lowest.
